This is the easier list where we count the points by giving every zone 100 points and then giving you a factor of the absolute maximum of 2 (meaning that no zone can give more than 200 points total) and the two factors are zone takes this round and zone takes the last 24 hours. Absolutely no PPH points at all.

Columns left to right: [Placement difference], [Place], [Turfplace], [Name], [Score], [% Diff], [Turfscore] (Rotate screen for all data). Explanation and examples of score calculations.
